member.name: M:ExampleLogic.ConceptLogics.CrossConnectedProportionalFeedback.RotateAwayFromObstruction(System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Single,System.Int32)

member.name: P:ExampleLogic.ExampleLogicBase.Details
member.summary: Contains the information that will be displayed in the GUI. It should be initialized, and all its fields set to your desired values in the constructor of the child-class.
